description:
****Course Updated in June 2016****

Welcome to this course: Master MongoDB with Ruby. MongoDB a is a high-performance, open source and schema-free database designed to handle document-oriented storage. MongoDB makes it possible to store and process large sets of data in ways that drive up business value.It's sort of a cross between scalable key/value stores and traditional functionality-rich relational databases.MongoDB might be useful as a fast, simple, non-transactional data store for a web application, or as a caching mechanism. 

This course is designed to make it easy for everyone to master MongoDB in Ruby. It has been divided into following main sections :

  • Introduction to MongoDB with Ruby
  • Installation
  • Mongoid

This amazing Course will help you quickly master all the difficult concepts and will the learning will be a breeze. 

Let's get started.
title: Master MongoDB with Ruby: From 0 to Hero
